name: Kershaw Cryo Knife
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: A compact pocket knife that excels at everyday tasks and is loaded with cool features. The Cryo is a collaboration between Kershaw and knife industry legend Rick Hinderer, bringing his classic design elements to a more accessible model without scaling back on quality.8Cr13MoV blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well.SpeedSafe® assisted opening mechanism and flipper tab makes deployment easy.Flipper tab doubles as a guard when the knife is open.Stainless steel frame-lock design effectively gives a folding knife full-tang rigidity.Lock bar overtravel disc adds safety.Jimping on the front and back of the handle for a secure grip.Ambidextrous 4-position deep-carry pocket clip.Chosen by Blade Magazine as 2012’s Best Buy of the Year, and Men’s Journal Approved Gear in 2013.
